BatchApplyAccountBaselines.document: This example shows you how to apply baselines to existing accounts in batches.
BatchApplyAccountBaselines.title: Applying baselines to existing accounts in batches

GetAccountFactoryBaseline.document: This example shows you how to obtain user baseline configuration.
GetAccountFactoryBaseline.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: controlcenter.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: GetAccountFactoryBaseline
<Common request parameters>

{}
GetAccountFactoryBaseline.title: Example

ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems.document: This example shows you how to retrieve the account baseline list from console.
ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: controlcenter.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Limit": 10,
    "Offset": 0
}
ListAccountFactoryBaselineItems.title: Example

ListDeployStepTasks.document: This example shows you how to retrieve deployment task history by baseline ID.
ListDeployStepTasks.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: controlcenter.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: ListDeployStepTasks
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Limit": 10,
    "Offset": 0,
    "Identifier": "TCC-AF_CAM_USER_PASSWORD_POLICY"
}
ListDeployStepTasks.title: Example

UpdateAccountFactoryBaseline.document: This example shows you how to batch update or add user baseline configurations.
UpdateAccountFactoryBaseline.title: Example
